metadata.title: RHSA-2024:7793: buildah security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The buildah package provides a tool for facilitating building OCI container images. Among other things, buildah enables you to: Create a working container, either from scratch or using an image as a starting point; Create an image, either from a working container or using the instructions in a Dockerfile; Build both Docker and OCI images. 

Security Fix(es):

* encoding/gob: golang: Calling Decoder.Decode on a message which contains deeply nested structures can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion (CVE-2024-34156)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: encoding/gob: golang: Calling Decoder.Decode on a message which contains deeply nested structures can cause a panic due to stack exhaustion

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 Update Services for SAP Solutions

criterions.comment: buildah is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
buildah-tests is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
